name: FindGithubLabels
description:
Search for labels in a GitHub repository by keywords.

Use this tool to find labels in a specific GitHub repository whose names or descriptions match provided search keywords. Ideal for locating labels like 'bug' or 'enhancement' quickly. Returns up to 100 results per page, with optional text match metadata for enhanced search insights.

parameters.name: repository_id
parameters.description: The ID of the repository where labels will be searched.

parameters.name: search_keywords
parameters.description: Keywords to search for in label names or descriptions. Excludes qualifiers.

value_schema.description: The search keywords. This endpoint does not accept qualifiers in the query. To learn more about the format of the query, see [Constructing a search query](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/search#constructing-a-search-query).

parameters.name: sort_labels_by
parameters.description: Specifies how to sort the query results by the timestamp fields 'created' or 'updated'. Defaults to 'best match'.

value_schema.description: Sorts the results of your query by when the label was `created` or `updated`. Default: [best match](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/search#ranking-search-results)

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Determines if the highest ('desc') or lowest ('asc') matches appear first. Requires 'sort' to be set.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the first search result returned is the highest number of matches (`desc`) or lowest number of matches (`asc`). This parameter is ignored unless you provide `sort`.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of label results to display per page, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: result_page_number
parameters.description: Specifies the page number of the search results to fetch. Useful for pagination.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
